data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about YER to USD

How much is 1 Yemeni Rial in US Dollars?

1 Yemeni Rial = 0.003994 US Dollars as of August 19, 2024 12:10 PM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between Yemeni Rials and US Dollars using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 Yemeni Rials in US Dollars?

As of August 19, 2024 12:10 PM UTC, 100 Yemeni Rials is equivalent to 0.3994 US Dollars. The exchange rate at this time is 0.003994 US Dollars per Yemeni Rial.

What was the highest YER to USD exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from Yemeni Rials to US Dollars was on June 9, 2015 when each Yemeni Rial was worth 0.004658 US Dollars.

When is the best time to convert YER to USD?

The YER and USD can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert Yemeni Rials to US Dollars because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert Yemeni Rials to US Dollars early in the week if you need USD urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the Yemeni Rial or the US Dollar?

The US Dollar is currently stronger than the Yemeni Rial, as 1 USD is equal to 250.40 YER. Conversely, 1 YER is worth 0.003994 USD.

Is the Yemeni Rial up or down against the US Dollar?

The Yemeni Rial has decreased -0.07% year-to-date against the US Dollar. Over the past 10 years, the Yemeni Rial has declined -14.14% against the US Dollar. Consequently, the Yemeni Rial has lost purchasing power compared to the US Dollar over the last decade.

What's the best YER to USD exchange rate today?

As of August 19, 2024 12:10 PM UTC, the best YER to USD exchange rate is 0.003994 USD. This means that for every Yemeni Rial you exchange, you will receive 0.003994 US Dollars.
